site.heading: A Cryptographic Discovery
site.description: A historical archive documenting the mathematical bridge between Bitcoin Block #283 and Qubic's ternary architecture.

formula.title: The Formula
formula.description: A mathematical proof connecting Bitcoin Block #283 to Qubic through the equation 625,284 = 283 x 47^2 + 137.

matrix.title: The Matrix
matrix.description: A 128x128 memory architecture mapping the complete data flow from Bitcoin input to Qubic output.

timelock.title: The Time-Lock
timelock.description: A cryptographic mechanism with tick difference exactly divisible by 121, pointing to March 3, 2026.

nextjs.description: Built with Next.js using app router.

more.title: and more!
more.description: Many more features to use like documents and blog posts using MDX, dark and white mode, search command palette, internationalized sitemap and more...

not_found.description: The document you are looking for does not exist.
not_found.title: Document not found
